last sentence correction: Protag dodged a bullet but*

1. 待たない - is him saying "I'm not waiting" after she asks him to wait 2. 私は好きだよ - could be interpreted as her confession or that she likes the mountains/views. Given her slap to the netori when he mentions the cuck's name it would seem like she does like him. 3. Where it talks about her being sensitive it's specifically about her nipples being big and sensitive 4. When he says he hates Akane he's actually saying that "Akane doesn't ike it" and he must stop it 「茜が嫌がってる」the mistake here is a transitive verb and well you know I'm just not in the mood to retranslate the whole thing. Please note I'm not trying to criticize the translator at least he translates here I have Japanese knowledge and don't do shit with it other than post on a porn site. As for the story itself but I kinda feel sorry for the heroine too since I gather this is much like "zutto suki datta" just with a playboy instead of a teacher.

But our MC here is so dense and fixated on leaving town (again, in an NTR, that's what the author FABRICATES MC to be in a helpless situation) that he just witnesses the act. And the girl... of course she enjoyed the sex even if it's with a dude that is a player/womanizer/ugly bastard/motherfucker/etc(any kind of bad guy). Also, as other guys pointed out, what's with the confession and then run off to that other dude? So either MC flat out rejected her cuz she was annoying (again a dense MC) or that there was a time lapse and she got no response and got approached by the fucker (although not mentioned in the story). Anyways, it's an NTR work of fiction, purposely made to induce negative emotions to the readers.
